sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>CMDB - Specify display column for table: cmdb_key_value</description> <name>CMDB -Specify display column in KeyValue</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); gr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_key_value'); gr.addQuery('element', 'key'); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { gr.setValue("display", true); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-03-13 03:28:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>58c28b017723001033b5270bba10612b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CMDB -Specify display column in KeyValue</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_58c28b017723001033b5270bba10612b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 22:18:25</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
